overview:
Terry until recently managed the Rainbow Seed Fund and has significant experience with seed investments especially with PSREs. Previously he was Finance Director and Investment Manager of West Midlands Enterprise Ltd. Terry has a degree in minerals engineering and an MBA. He has over 20 years experience in the venture capital industry, having started his career in the industry with 3i in Manchester. He was a director of a Birmingham based SME angel investor matching service.

In addition to investing in seed stage proposals and managing STLâ€™s investment portfolio, he will help to source technology-based proposals from business incubators, universities and research institutions.
